docs.snippet: Italian lenders Popolare di Vicenza and Veneto Banca have unveiled a proposed settlement deal with disgruntled shareholders that could cost the two banks more than 600 million euros (£521 million), adding to capital pressures that may push th...
docs.lead_paragraph: Italian lenders Popolare di Vicenza and Veneto Banca have unveiled a proposed settlement deal with disgruntled shareholders that could cost the two banks more than 600 million euros (£521 million), adding to capital pressures that may push them to request state aid.

headline.main: Popolare Di Vicenza, Veneto Banca Pin Hopes on Shareholders' Settlement Deal
headline.print_headline: Popolare Di Vicenza, Veneto Banca Pin Hopes on Shareholders' Settlement Deal

docs.snippet: Kenya's president Monday signed an amendment to the country's election law to allow manual voting and counting of ballots as a backup, a move the opposition called a back door to rigging this year's presidential election....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kenya's president Monday signed an amendment to the country's election law to allow manual voting and counting of ballots as a backup, a move the opposition called a back door to rigging this year's presidential election.

headline.main: Kenyan President Signs Electoral Law Amid Rigging Fears
headline.print_headline: Kenyan President Signs Electoral Law Amid Rigging Fears

docs.snippet: A doctor who performed unnecessary spinal surgeries in California before moving to Michigan to commit the same scheme was sentenced Monday to nearly 20 years in prison after former patients tearfully described how their lives have been ravaged by ...
docs.lead_paragraph: A doctor who performed unnecessary spinal surgeries in California before moving to Michigan to commit the same scheme was sentenced Monday to nearly 20 years in prison after former patients tearfully described how their lives have been ravaged by pain and ceaseless complications.

headline.main: Nearly 20 Years in Prison for Surgeon and His 'Butchery'
headline.print_headline: Nearly 20 Years in Prison for Surgeon and His 'Butchery'
